search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Zulip (zulip.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Zulip is located at: [https://zulip.com/plans/](https://zulip.com/plans/)【3:0†source】.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Zulip offers a free tier and managed cloud or self-hosting options. Some features are billed hourly or require inquiry.

features: 5 GB total file sharing and storage
